summary: This is a forwarded email from June 29, 2010, arranging a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein at his New York City home on July 8, 2010, at 5:00 PM. The message includes his address and indicates a follow-up confirmation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email is arranging a meeting at his home. He is the person the visitor is coming to see.

events.title: Scheduled Meeting at Epstein's Home
events.description: A meeting is scheduled for 5:00 PM at Jeffrey Epstein's New York City residence.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY (between 5th and Madison Avenues)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's New York City residence in 2010 was 9 East 71st Street.
A meeting was scheduled at this address for July 8, 2010, at 5:00 PM.
The correspondence shows Epstein was actively scheduling meetings at his home during this period.
